properties.name: camel.component.docling.api-key-header
properties.description: Header name for API key authentication

properties.name: camel.component.docling.api-timeout
properties.description: API request timeout in milliseconds

properties.name: camel.component.docling.async-poll-interval
properties.description: Polling interval for async conversion status in milliseconds

properties.name: camel.component.docling.async-timeout
properties.description: Maximum time to wait for async conversion completion in milliseconds

properties.name: camel.component.docling.authentication-scheme
properties.description: Authentication scheme (BEARER, API_KEY, NONE)

properties.name: camel.component.docling.authentication-token
properties.description: Authentication token for docling-serve API (Bearer token or API key)

properties.name: camel.component.docling.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.docling.batch-fail-on-first-error
properties.description: Fail entire batch on first error (true) or continue processing remaining documents (false)

properties.name: camel.component.docling.batch-parallelism
properties.description: Number of parallel threads for batch processing

properties.name: camel.component.docling.batch-size
properties.description: Maximum number of documents to process in a single batch (batch operations only)

properties.name: camel.component.docling.batch-timeout
properties.description: Maximum time to wait for batch completion in milliseconds

properties.name: camel.component.docling.configuration
properties.description: The configuration for the Docling Endpoint. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.docling.DoclingConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.docling.connection-request-timeout
properties.description: Connection request timeout in milliseconds (timeout when requesting connection from pool)

properties.name: camel.component.docling.connection-time-to-live
properties.description: Time to live for connections in milliseconds (-1 for infinite)

properties.name: camel.component.docling.connection-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout in milliseconds

properties.name: camel.component.docling.content-in-body
properties.description: Include the content of the output file in the exchange body and delete the output file

properties.name: camel.component.docling.convert-endpoint
properties.description: Docling-serve API convert endpoint path

properties.name: camel.component.docling.docling-command
properties.description: Path to Docling Python executable or command

properties.name: camel.component.docling.docling-serve-url
properties.description: Docling-serve API URL (e.g., http://localhost:5001)

properties.name: camel.component.docling.enable-o-c-r
properties.description: Enable OCR processing for scanned documents

properties.name: camel.component.docling.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the docling component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.docling.evict-idle-connections
properties.description: Enable eviction of idle connections from the pool

properties.name: camel.component.docling.extract-all-metadata
properties.description: Extract all available metadata fields including custom/raw fields

properties.name: camel.component.docling.include-layout-info
properties.description: Show layout information with bounding boxes

properties.name: camel.component.docling.include-metadata-in-headers
properties.description: Include metadata in message headers when extracting metadata

properties.name: camel.component.docling.include-raw-metadata
properties.description: Include raw metadata as returned by the parser

properties.name: camel.component.docling.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.docling.max-connections-per-route
properties.description: Maximum connections per route in the connection pool

properties.name: camel.component.docling.max-file-size
properties.description: Maximum file size in bytes for processing

properties.name: camel.component.docling.max-idle-time
properties.description: Maximum idle time for connections in milliseconds before eviction

properties.name: camel.component.docling.max-total-connections
properties.description: Maximum total connections in the connection pool

properties.name: camel.component.docling.ocr-language
properties.description: Language code for OCR processing

properties.name: camel.component.docling.operation
properties.description: The operation to perform

properties.name: camel.component.docling.output-format
properties.description: Output format for document conversion

properties.name: camel.component.docling.process-timeout
properties.description: Timeout for Docling process execution in milliseconds

properties.name: camel.component.docling.socket-timeout
properties.description: Socket timeout in milliseconds

properties.name: camel.component.docling.split-batch-results
properties.description: Split batch results into individual exchanges (one per document) instead of single BatchProcessingResults

properties.name: camel.component.docling.use-async-mode
properties.description: Use asynchronous conversion mode (docling-serve API only)

properties.name: camel.component.docling.use-docling-serve
properties.description: Use docling-serve API instead of CLI command

properties.name: camel.component.docling.validate-after-inactivity
properties.description: Validate connections after inactivity in milliseconds

properties.name: camel.component.docling.working-directory
properties.description: Working directory for Docling execution
